item.title: How to Decarbonize
item.description: The target of this post is to build a baseline mental model of energy supply and CO2 reduction on a country-wide level. Be warned that “baseline model” is way less than a detailed expert model: the model serves as a robust rough guide to the state of the world, but there are a lot of small details missing. (My example here is Germany but all calculations are on a per-person level.
